title: Number of pet stores in Canada by region 2018
summary: This bar chart has 12 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Number of stores in each Month on the y axis.
The maximum Number of stores 762.0 is found at Month Ontario and the minimum is found at Yukon where Month is 3.0.
There is a difference of 759.0 between the maximum Month Ontario and minimum Month Yukon.
min_summary: This bar chart has 12 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Number of stores in each Month on the y axis.
The Number of stores is highest at Month Ontario and lowest at Month Yukon.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 12 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Number of stores in each Month on the y axis.
The maximum Number of stores 762.0 is found at Month Ontario and the minimum is found at Yukon where Month is 3.0.
There is a difference of 759.0 between the maximum Month Ontario and minimum Month Yukon.
max_summary: This bar chart has 12 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Number of stores in each Month on the y axis.
The Number of stores is highest at Month Ontario and lowest at Month Yukon.
Second maximum Number of stores is found at Month Quebec.
The highest Month Ontario has 759.0 more Number of stores than the lowest Month Yukon.
Number of stores at Month Ontario is 762.0 , second place is Quebec at 469.0, and thirdly is British Columbia at 348.0.
Overall Number of stores has declined over the Months.
Month Yukon, and Northwest Territories share the same value 3.0.
The Month Yukon has 4.36 times less Number of stores than average.
